briefTitle: Magnetic Resonance Imaging of the Whole Body, Including Diffusion, in the Medical Evaluation of Breast Cancers at High Risk for Metastasis and the Follow-up of Metastatic Cancers
officialTitle: Magnetic Resonance Imaging of the Whole Body, Including Diffusion, in the Medical Evaluation of Breast Cancers at High Risk for Metastasis and the Follow-up of Metastatic Cancers
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histological diagnosis of breast carcinoma B5
* Axillary lymph node punction C5 or metastatic
* Performance status from 0 to 2.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Ferromagnetic metallic foreign bodies (pacemakers, implanted cochlear, neurostimulator, ...)
* Claustrophobia
